programme.title: CNA Correspondent
programme.desc: Following the coup in Myanmar, neighbouring Thailand braces for a potential humanitarian crisis as villagers near the border flee increased violence between the military and ethnic army groups.(n)

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: The global air fryer market is expected to reach US$1.2b by 2026. With more Singaporeans using air fryers, Talking Point investigates how much healthier air frying really is, compared to deep frying.(n)

programme.title: Singapore Tonight
programme.desc: From business to politics, health to technology, the latest news from Singapore and analysis of the impact.(n)

programme.title: Belly Of A Nation S2
programme.desc: COVID-19 forces Singapore into semi-lockdown. Hawkers cope with lesser footfall and the demands of religion. But from ground-up, hawkers, drivers and customers unite for the love of food.(n)

programme.title: Global Business
programme.desc: The flagship business program of 18's English language service. The program offers in-depth analysis of the latest economic data, business trends and market moving policies, zooming in on how all this affects ordinary people. With separate editions out of Asia, Europe, Africa and the Americas, Global Business features analysts and news-makers supported through a global network of correspondents. Global Business shows you what's moving markets in both developed and emerging economies. The bi...(n)

programme.title: Africa Live
programme.desc: Africa Live is a news program that focuses on African issues and issues related to this diverse continent. 18's Nairobi-based broadcast center produces Africa Live. Local correspondents and local production teams provide authoritative and in-depth stories from across the region. Africa Live is an objective and comprehensive look at every facet of African life.(n)

programme.title: The World Today
programme.desc: The core rolling news service of 18, with regular updates from Beijing, Washington, and London, keep viewers up-to-date with all the world's top stories as they happen. The World Today delivers breaking news, live events, in-depth reporting, expert analysis and sustained coverage.(n)

programme.title: Dialogue
programme.desc: Dialogue is a prime time daily English talk show on 18. The 30-minute talk show covers a wide range of domestic and international topics, providing a balanced and critical perspective on current affairs and analysis within the framework of cross-cultural and multi-disciplinary comparisons. Inviting decision makers in government, business and academia onto the show, the host Yang Rui encourages guests to speak their minds frankly. programme.title: World Insight with Tian Wei
programme.desc: World Insight with Tian Wei is a long-running international platform for debate and intelligent discussion. It is the meeting point of both the highly influential and rising voices, facilitated by host, Tian Wei. programme.title: The Point with Liu Xin
programme.desc: The Point with LIU Xin is a current affairs program on 18. The program comments on global news through LIU Xin's very own unique perspective. With two decades of experience as a news anchor and overseas correspondent, LIU Xin has an engaging and personal style. The Point with LIU Xin connects world audience through social media, enhancing their participation as well as offering a comprehensive perspective on world events.(n)

programme.title: Americas Now
programme.desc: Americas Now profiles the development, diversity and challenges facing the Americas, particularly Latin America. The strength of the program is its storytelling. Correspondents across the region present insightful, well-researched and engaging narratives. Americas Now is a compelling, authoritative and balanced voice from the region, giving 18 a competitive edge in the North American media market.(n)

programme.title: The Heat
programme.desc: The Heat is a daily talk show anchored from Washington, D.C. It focuses on top stories making news globally. The Heat presents tough issues from a comprehensive, balanced and international and Chinese perspective. Guests from on the spot and around the world ensure lively debate and a range of voices. Wherever the story is happening, The Heat is there.(n)

programme.title: China 24
programme.desc: China 24 is a prime time news program featuring in-depth reports and analysis of the stories in the headlines in China. Produced by 18's studios in Beijing and Washington D.C., the show takes a compelling and comprehensive look at China. It explores the country's business, politics, technology, culture, entertainment and more. China 24 tackles head-on the issues that matter most to the nation and its people, with topical reports highlighting challenges facing this fast-changing country.(n)

programme.title: Lethal Weapon S3

programme.title: Young Sheldon S4
programme.desc: For 11-year-old Sheldon Cooper, it isn't easy growing up in East Texas. And while the vulnerable, gifted and somewhat naïve Sheldon deals with the world, his family must find a way to deal with him.(n)

programme.title: Supergirl S6
programme.desc: Kara grew up in the shadow of her foster sister, Alex (CHYLER LEIGH), and learned to conceal the phenomenal powers she shares with her famous cousin, Superman, in order to keep her identity a secret.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1
programme.desc: Competition boils over when bitter rivals Brandon and Jesse throw down over a storage unit containing an amazing movie monster and a potential hundred thousand dollar payout. Security steps in, but can they separate the boys before the blood hits thefloor.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1
programme.desc: Brandon and Lori look to cash in on their first big trip to New Orleans, but the locals are hungering for a fight. Then, the Taylor Brothers wage war to win a locker loaded with hunting and sporting equipment. What no one knows is that hidden beneaththe f.(n)

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1

programme.title: Storage Hunters S1

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Two friends and magicians become bitter enemies after a sudden tragedy. As they devote their lives to a rivalry played out on stage, the sacrifices each makes will lead them to fame and to tragedy.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Sorcerer's Stone
programme.desc: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone tells the story of a boy who learns on his 11th birthday that he is the orphaned son of two powerful wizards and possesses unique magical powers of his own.(n)

programme.title: Harry Potter And The Chamber Of Secrets
programme.desc: After a long summer with the horrid Dursleys, Harry Potter is thwarted in his attempts to board the train to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry to begin his second year. Harry's only transportation option is a magical flying car.(n)

programme.title: Escape Plan: The Extractors
programme.desc: After rescuing the kidnapped daughter of a Hong Kong tech mogul from a Latvian prison, Ray Breslin's girlfriend is also captured. Now Breslin and his team must pull off a deadly mission against time.(n)
